title: Best effort enable ATen C++ tests in Buck build.
body_html:
Stack:
    ⚫️  #13051 Best effort enable ATen C++ tests in Buck build.  💚
    ⚪️  #13021 Delete default constructor from CUDAStream.  💛

This is only a best effort patch, because some of the tests
still don't work:

  • Some tests are CUDA only, and they'll fail with a nastygram
    if you run them on CPU. We should split them into CPU
    and CUDA tests separately, so you can run the CPU bits on
    Sandcastle and devvm.

  • The tbb test hung when I tried to run it. Blah.

  • People are almost certainly going to forget to add new tests.
    But I don't really know how to glob and then extract the
    basename of files in Buck. I plan to ask on the Buck group
    on how to do this.

Differential Revision: D10528061

Stack:
    :black_circle:  **#13051 Best effort enable ATen C++ tests in Buck build.**  [:green_heart:](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D10528061/)
    :white_circle:  #13021 Delete default constructor from CUDAStream.  [:yellow_heart:](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D10520421/)

This is only a best effort patch, because some of the tests
still don't work:

- Some tests are CUDA only, and they'll fail with a nastygram
  if you run them on CPU.  We should split them into CPU
  and CUDA tests separately, so you can run the CPU bits on
  Sandcastle and devvm.

- The tbb test hung when I tried to run it.  Blah.

- People are almost certainly going to forget to add new tests.
  But I don't really know how to glob and then extract the
  basename of files in Buck.  I plan to ask on the Buck group
  on how to do this.
